product_name: The North Face Winter Runners Gloves
long_description: The North Face Winter Runners gloves transform from gloves to mittens and back again so you can find the right level of comfort for your long training runs. Polyester soft-shell gloves are treated with a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture. Mitten hoods flip over the glove fingers for extra warmth; when not in use, mitten hoods tuck into the backs of the gloves. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. Stash your house key in the small pocket on the palm. The North Face Winter Runners gloves have reflective hits that increase your visibility to motorists at night.
